properties.ADDRESS_NOTES: Plenty of street parking

properties.SCHEDULING_NOTES: Our market is open on the Second Saturday of each month, from 1-4pm

properties.NAME: Overbrook Farmers Market

properties.MAJOR_BUS_SUBWAY_ROUTES: SEPTA Routes 65, 105, G, R5 Paoli-Thorndale Line (Overbrook Station)
properties.NOTES: We are not currently looking for volunteers for this farmers market. Here is the link to sign up for our newsletter: http://thefoodtrust.org/contact/sign-up

properties.NAME: Frankford Transportation Center Farmers Market

properties.MAJOR_BUS_SUBWAY_ROUTES: SEPTA Routes: 3, 5, 8, 14, 19, 20, 24, 25, 26, 50, 58, 66, 73, 84, 88, R, Market-Frankford Line (Frankford Transportation Center)
properties.ONLINE_ORDERING_INFO: We offer pre-orders by clicking on the vendor's website which are hyperlinked on our website: http://thefoodtrust.org/farmers-markets/market/frankford-transportation-center

properties.NAME: East Parkside Farmers Market
properties.ADDRESS: Clayborn and Lewis Recreation Center, 1101 N 38th St
properties.ADDRESS_NOTES: Street parking available nearby
properties.NOTES: We are not currently looking for volunteers for this farmers market. Here is the link to sign up for our newsletter: http://thefoodtrust.org/contact/sign-up

properties.NAME: Henry Got Crops Farm Market
properties.ADDRESS_NOTES: Right-turn-in-only gravel driveway immediately before the Cinnaminson St + Henry Avenue traffic light. Located on W.B. Saul High School's campus, across Henry Ave from their main classroom buildings. Small parking lot on site, ample street parking close by.
properties.MAJOR_BUS_SUBWAY_ROUTES: Directly on 27 SEPTA Bus route, 15 min walk if taking SEPTA 9 bus route
properties.SCHEDULING_NOTES:
During month of November *only* hours shorten to 10 am - 5 pm during the weekdays, Saturday hours unchanged. 
Closed Friday 11/25 and Saturday 11/26.
properties.LOW_COST_OPTIONS: Additional discounts for Weavers Way Co-op members enrolled in our Senior discount program and our Food-For-All program
properties.HOW_TO_VOLUNTEER: Monthly farm volunteer days are open to the public, future dates listed on Weavers Way Co-op's events calendar https://weaversway.coop/events
properties.NOTES: We publish a weekly Farm Market e-newsletter highlighting new seasonal products, vendor sampling events, volunteer days, local vendor spotlights, etc. Sign up at https://weaversway.coop/farm-newsletter

properties.NAME: 52nd and Haverford Farmers Market
properties.ADDRESS_NOTES: Street parking available nearby
properties.NOTES: We are not currently looking for volunteers for this farmers market. Here is the link to sign up for our newsletter: http://thefoodtrust.org/contact/sign-up

properties.NAME: Farmers Market at Christ Church
properties.ADDRESS_NOTES: Park America Parking Lot at 210 Filbert Street
properties.ONLINE_ORDERING_INFO: Go to neighborhood-house.com/farmers-market for a full list.

properties.NAME: Rittenhouse Farmers Market
properties.ADDRESS_NOTES: Metered parking on the surrounding streets, garage parking lots nearby.
properties.MAJOR_BUS_SUBWAY_ROUTES:
SEPTA 21, 42 and 17 buses,
Amtrak regional rail to Suburban Station
properties.ONLINE_ORDERING_INFO: Some of the producers accept online orders which can be picked up at the market.
properties.HOW_TO_VOLUNTEER: volunteer to help with market set-up on Saturdays. email us at: info@farmtocity.org

properties.NAME: East Falls Farmers' Market
properties.ADDRESS_NOTES: Driving from Center City or southbound on I-76, take Kelly Drive to parking lot entrance on South Ferry Road, across from Breakfast Boutique. Driving southbound on Roosevelt Boulevard, take ramp exit to Ridge Ave and enter lot from North Ferry Road, opposite InRiva. Parking lot can accommodate limited parking only. Parking lot also has Indigo bike station for bike commuters.
properties.MAJOR_BUS_SUBWAY_ROUTES: Short walk down Midvale from SEPTA Regional Rail Station the East Falls station (on Norristown line). 3 buses (R, 1, 61) travel Ridge Avenue alongside the market.

properties.NAME: Raíces Farm Stand
properties.ADDRESS_NOTES: Farm Stand will be found inside Raíces Garden. There is parking along 2nd Street.
properties.MAJOR_BUS_SUBWAY_ROUTES:
6 minute walk from York-Dauphin Market Frankford Line Stop
SEPTA Buses 39, 89, and 57

properties.NAME: Headhouse Farmers Market
properties.ADDRESS_NOTES: We close down the East side of 2nd street for vendor parking. The other side is left open for traffic. There is parking often available across the street from the market near the Wawa.
properties.MAJOR_BUS_SUBWAY_ROUTES: SEPTA Routes 12, 40, 57 or MFL at 2nd St.
properties.SCHEDULING_NOTES: From January through the end of April we operate under winter hours from 10am-1pm. Closed Easter.
properties.NOTES: We are often looking for volunteers for Headhouse Farmers Market. Volunteers who are interested can fill out this form on our website: http://thefoodtrust.org/contact/volunteer

properties.NAME: Fairmount Farmers Market
properties.ADDRESS_NOTES:
Street parking is available near the market. There is also a a paid parking lot right next to the market at 
2201 Fairmount Ave, Philadelphia, PA 19130.
properties.SCHEDULING_NOTES: During daylight savings time we switch to winter hours from 2pm-5pm. We will announce this change on our social media and in our newsletter (http://thefoodtrust.org/contact/sign-up).
properties.ONLINE_ORDERING_INFO: Most of our vendors offer pre-orders by clicking on their websites which are hyperlinked on our website: http://thefoodtrust.org/farmers-markets/market/fairmount
properties.NOTES: We are not currently looking for volunteers for this farmers market. Here is the link to sign up for our newsletter: http://thefoodtrust.org/contact/sign-up

properties.NAME: Pretzel Park Farmers Market
properties.ADDRESS_NOTES: Pretzel Park is bounded by Silverwood, Rector, Cresson and Cotton Streets, one block uphill from Main Street in Manayunk. The market is located between St. John the Baptist Church and St. Josephat's Church.  On-street parking is limited; $2/hr lot at bottom of Cotton Street, one block off Main Street, on Venice Island.
properties.MAJOR_BUS_SUBWAY_ROUTES: SEPTA Norristown commuter train stops at Manayunk Station on Cresson Street a few blocks from Pretzel Park. The SETPA 61 bus runs along Main Street.
properties.OTHER_SOCIAL: Information about the market and vendors is posted weekly (Tuesday or Wednesday) on Patch.com and NextDoor.com  Also, there is an email sent out by Friends of Pretzel Park (mail@friendsofpretzelpark.org) and Manayunk Neighborhood Council from their mailing lists.
properties.SCHEDULING_NOTES: The market is open rain or shine
properties.ONLINE_ORDERING_INFO: Each vendor determines what type of payment they will accept and whether customers can order online.  When the market news is posted weekly all that information is included
properties.NOTES: We are always looking for volunteers to assist with the market operation.

properties.NAME: Clark Park Farmers Market
properties.ADDRESS_NOTES: Street parking available near the market; the block between 43rd and Baltimore to 43rd and Chester is closed for the market.
properties.ONLINE_ORDERING_INFO: Vendors who accept pre-orders are linked on our website: http://thefoodtrust.org/farmers-markets/market/clark-park
properties.NOTES: We are looking for volunteers to help out at Clark Park. Interested volunteers can fill out an interest form: http://thefoodtrust.org/contact/volunteer. Here is the link to sign up for our newsletter: http://thefoodtrust.org/contact/sign-up.

properties.NAME: Brewerytown Garden Farmstand
properties.ADDRESS_NOTES: The farmstand is set up outside the garden, right at the corner of 27th & Master Streets.
properties.MAJOR_BUS_SUBWAY_ROUTES:
Route 7 bus stops at 27th & Master St.
Route 48 stops two blocks away at 29th & Master St.
properties.SCHEDULING_NOTES: Closed July 2nd for the holiday weekend

properties.NAME: Gorgas Park Farmers Market
properties.ADDRESS_NOTES: Street parking across from the park

properties.NAME: 58th & Baltimore - Cobbs Creek Library
properties.ADDRESS_NOTES: This market does have street parking but it is a busy area and parking is limited.
properties.OTHER_SOCIAL: If you call our office. Please leave a message and we'll get back to you.
properties.LOW_COST_OPTIONS: Every $5 you spend with your EBT card you will receive $2 in fruits & vegetables coupons.

properties.NAME: Germantown Farmers Market
properties.ADDRESS_NOTES: On the sidewalk on Germantown Avenue between School House Lane and Church Lane
properties.MAJOR_BUS_SUBWAY_ROUTES: SEPTA 23 bus, K, J, and 26 buses then walk two blocks north.
properties.OTHER_SOCIAL: Market Operator is a local farm, @phillyforests

properties.NAME: Mt. Airy Farmers Market
properties.ADDRESS_NOTES: Street parking widely available
properties.MAJOR_BUS_SUBWAY_ROUTES: SEPTA H bus or #23, then walk from Germantown Ave.
